info.name: GW系統 API
info.description: 物流系統的 API 文檔。

response.name: Email 已存在
response.description: Email 已存在，無法創建新用戶

response.name: 請求驗證失敗
response.body: {"message":"The given data was invalid.","errors":{"name":["The name field is required."],"email":["The email field is required."],"password":["The password field is required."]}}

response.name: 請求驗證失敗
response.body: {"message":"The given data was invalid.","errors":{"email":["The email must be a valid email address."]}}

response.name: 成功註冊用戶
response.description: 用戶註冊成功並發送驗證信。
response.body: {"message":"Registration successful. Please check your email to verify your account."}

response.name: 驗證失敗
response.description: 註冊時的資料驗證失敗。
response.body: {"message":"The given data was invalid.","errors":{"password_confirmation":["The password confirmation does not match."]}}

response.name: 未授權
response.description: 無效的 Token 或未認證。

response.name: 成功獲取用戶資料
response.description: 成功獲取當前用戶的資料。

response.name: 驗證連結已過期
response.description: 驗證連結無效或已過期。

response.name: 電子郵件已驗證
response.description: 電子郵件已經被驗證過。

response.name: 成功重新發送驗證郵件
response.description: 驗證郵件重新發送成功。

response.name: 電子郵件已驗證
response.description: 用戶的電子郵件已經被驗證，無需重新發送驗證郵件。

request.description:
所有受保護的 API 都需要使用 Bearer Token 進行身份驗證。

每個請求必須在 HTTP Header 中包含以下內容：

**Header:**
```http
Authorization: Bearer {{access_token}}
```

如果未提供 Token 或 Token 無效，API 將返回對應的錯誤響應。

response.name: 成功響應
response.description: 身份驗證成功，請求被授權執行。

response.name: 未授權
response.description: 未提供有效的 Token 或 Token 已過期。

response.name: 禁止訪問
response.description: 用戶已認證，但未具備所需權限。

response.name: 請求驗證失敗
response.description: 輸入的數據驗證失敗，通常是電子郵件格式不正確
response.body: {"message":"The given data was invalid.","errors":{"to":["The to field is required."]}}

response.name: 發送失敗
response.description: 伺服器內部錯誤導致郵件未成功發送

response.name: 成功發送密碼重置連結
response.description: 密碼重置連結已發送到用戶的電子郵件。
response.body: {"message":"Password reset link sent to your email."}

response.name: 用戶不存在
response.description: 請求的電子郵件不存在於系統中。
response.body: {"message":"The given data was invalid.","errors":{"email":["The selected email is invalid."]}}

response.name: 成功重置密碼
response.description: 用戶密碼已成功重置，可以使用新密碼登入。
response.body: {"message":"Password reset successful. You can now log in with your new password."}

response.name: 無效或過期的令牌
response.description: 提供的重置令牌無效或已過期。

response.name: 驗證失敗
response.description: 新密碼的資料驗證失敗，例如密碼長度不足或確認密碼不匹配。
response.body: {"message":"The given data was invalid.","errors":{"password_confirmation":["The password confirmation does not match."]}}

response.name: 當前密碼錯誤
response.description: 提供的當前密碼與系統記錄的密碼不匹配。
response.body: {"message":"The given data was invalid.","errors":{"current_password":["The current password is incorrect."]}}

response.name: 新密碼驗證失敗
response.description: 新密碼的資料驗證失敗，例如密碼長度不足或確認密碼不匹配。
response.body: {"message":"The given data was invalid.","errors":{"new_password_confirmation":["The new password confirmation does not match."]}}

response.name: 未授權
response.description: 驗證 Token 不正確或已過期。

response.name: 請求驗證失敗
response.body: {"message":"The given data was invalid.","errors":{"name":["The name field is required."]}}

response.name: 成功更新價格記錄
response.description: 成功更新了已存在的 truck_id, port_name, postal_code 的記錄

response.name: 請求驗證失敗

response.name: 成功獲取該卡車的價格記錄
response.description: 成功獲取該卡車的所有價格記錄，資料會按港口分組並包含價格細節。

response.name: 找不到該卡車的價格記錄
response.description: 找不到與該 truck_id 相關的價格記錄。
response.body: {"message": "No prices found for the given truck"}

item.name: Delete a price record by ID

body.raw: {"origin_port": "基隆港","destination": {"postal_code": "200","city": "基隆市","district": "信義區","address": "某某路 某巷 123號 5樓 A室","has_elevator": true},"items": [{"type": "防水袋", "quantity": 56, "weight_per_item": 720, "length": 30, "width": 40, "height": 25}]}

response.name: 成功計算價格
response.description: 成功返回符合條件的卡車和費用資訊
response.body: {"status": "success","origin_port": "基隆港","destination": {"postal_code": "200","city": "基隆市","district": "信義區","address": "某某路 某巷 123號 5樓 A室","has_elevator": true},"items": [{"type": "防水袋","quantity": 56,"weight_per_item": 720,"length": 30,"width": 40,"height": 25,"cbm": 1.68}],"max_dimensions": {"length": 30,"width": 40,"height": 25},"totals": {"weight": 40320,"cbm": 1.68},"suitable_trucks": [{"id": 5,"type": "2噸","capacity_kg": 50000,"volume_cbm": "10.00","length": "400.00","width": "200.00","height": "200.00","has_tailgate": 1,"tailgate_capacity_kg": 1000,"status": "available"}],"best_truck": "2噸","final_price": 2200.00}

response.name: 沒有符合的卡車
response.description: 無法找到符合條件的卡車
response.body: {"status": "error","message": "No suitable trucks available.","reason": "No trucks meet the weight, volume, or dimension requirements."}

response.name: 沒有符合的費用
response.description: 無法找到符合條件的費用
response.body: {"status": "error","message": "No price available for the selected truck.","reason": "No matching truck price found for the specified origin port and postal code."}

response.name: 驗證錯誤
response.description: 輸入資料不完整或格式錯誤
response.body: {"status": "error","message": "Validation failed.","errors": {"origin_port": ["The origin port field is required."],"destination.postal_code": ["The destination.postal_code field is required."]}}
